categories: Category:Sith Lords of the Fel Empire
Category:Unidentified Sith of the One Sith

nodes.text: A member of Darth Krayt's One Sith, this Mantellian Savrip Sith was one of many Sith led by Darth Nihl in the Massacre at Ossus in 130 ABY, purging the Jedi Academy at Ossus and scattering the New Jedi Order.
